Reference

All functions

close_multiprocess()

Close parallel process

dispersal_distance()

Estimate dispersal distance using home range

distancefile()

Get a table or matrix with the distances between pairs of nodes.

dist_original

Distance matrix between habitat nodes in Spain

dist_restoration

Distance matrix between habitat nodes in Spain after an hypothetical restoration

Ecoregions

Ecoregions vector for analysis

EstConefor()

Estimation of connectivity indexes from CONEFOR

habitat_nodes

Nodes shapefile for analysis

habitat_nodes_raster

habitat nodes in raster format

habitat_nodes_spain

File of habitat nodes in Spain

list_forest_patches

List of vegetation patches

make_grid()

Make grid

MK_BCentrality()

Betweenness Centrality metrics using Conefor command line

MK_Connect_grid()

Connectivity indexes in a regular grid

MK_dECA()

Estimate the ECA, rECA, dA and dECA.

MK_dECA_grid()

Estimate the ECA, dA and dECA in a regular grid

MK_dPCIIC()

Estimate the probability of connectivity (PC) or the integral index of connectivity (IIC) and prioritize nodes

MK_dPCIIC_links()

Estimate the differential of the connectivity indexes IIC and PC to prioritize links.

MK_dPC_SAMC()

Estimate the probability of connectivity (PC) and prioritize nodes using Spatial Absorbing Markov Chains

MK_Focal_nodes()

Estimate the focal integral index of connectivity or the focal probability of connectivity

MK_Fragmentation()

Fragmentation Statistics

MK_ProtConn()

Protected Connected (ProtConn)

MK_ProtConnMult()

Multiple Protected Connected (ProtConn)

MK_ProtConn_raster()

Protected Connected (ProtConn) using raster nodes

MK_RMCentrality()

Estimate radial and medial centrality measures.

nodesfile()

Creation of nodefile attribute.

probability_distance()

Plot probability of dispersal

Protected_areas_raster

Protected areas raster for analysis

resistance_matrix

Landscape resistance to dispersal

study_area

Study area example

test_metric_distance()

Test the ECA or ProtConn metrics using multiple dispersal distances

TMVS

Trans-Mexican Volcanic System (TMVS)

unit_convert()

Convert numeric types from one area unit to another
